note.p: His house near Woodbridge, Suffolk (13 May 1880)
Career: Fellow of Jesus College, Cambridge; Professor of Geology, King's College, London
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1880-1881 vol 31 pp i-ii
References: David A Cumming, 'John MacCulloch, FRS, at Addiscombe: The Lectureships in Chemistry and Geology' in NR 1979-80 vol 34 pp 155-183
Notes: Boase gives death date as 20 May 1880
